Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, buccal swab, or other suitable specimen for DNA extraction
Purpose: To detect characteristic differential DNA methylation patterns associated with Beckwith-Wiedemann Syndrome and Russell-Silver Syndrome for diagnostic evaluation.
Container: Appropriate DNA collection container (e.g., EDTA tube for blood or sterile buccal-swab collection tube)
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, quantitative PCR machine, thermal cycler, microcentrifuge, DNA methylation array scanner
